title: New Search — Fix client selection modal layout
description: Fix the client selection modal positioning, alignment, width, padding, and overflow when selecting a client in the search page header. Modal should be visually clear, properly aligned to its trigger, and accessible.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal aligns correctly relative to header trigger button
Modal has proper width and padding with no content overflow
Modal is accessible (keyboard navigable, focus trapped)
Modal renders correctly on all viewport sizes

steps.description: Locate the client selection modal component
steps.details: Find the modal in the new search page (app/admin/search/new/). Identify the component rendering the client selector dropdown/modal and its positioning logic.

Check absolute/fixed positioning, transform, top/left values. Ensure modal is anchored to trigger button using proper positioning strategy (e.g., Radix Popover or absolute positioning relative to parent).
Set appropriate max-width (e.g., w-80 or max-w-sm), add consistent padding (p-3 or p-4), add overflow-y-auto with max-height to handle long client lists.
Verify modal renders correctly on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1280px+). Ensure no content clips off-screen.

technicalNotes: Check if using Radix UI Popover or custom modal — approach differs
Ensure z-index doesn't conflict with header sticky positioning
